keyword: how many calories are in a reeses cup
title: How Many Calories Are in a Reese's Cup?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a Reese's cup, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Reese's Cup?
assumptions: Standard single Reese's Peanut Butter Cup (milk chocolate with peanut butter filling, ~9 g); no wrappers or additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, flavor variant, brand batch, and storage; check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A single Reese's Peanut Butter Cup contains about 105 kcal and 2.5 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: King size Reese's cup (double the standard)
White chocolate variant instead of milk
Peanut butter cups without chocolate coating

faqs.q: How many calories are in a single Reese's cup?
faqs.a: Approximately 105 kcal for one standard Reese's Peanut Butter Cup.

faqs.q: What are the macros in a Reese's cup?
faqs.a: About 12 g carbs, 6.5 g fat, 2.5 g protein, with 10 g sugars.

faqs.q: Does a Reese's cup have trans fat?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g trans fat in a standard Reese's cup.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Reese's cup?
Are Reese's cups high in saturated fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 3 g saturated fat per cup from the chocolate and peanut butter.
